summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 KYMCO PEOPLE 150 MOTOR SCOOTER.  WHILE TRAVELING AT ANY SPEED, THE ENGINE BEGINS TO LOSE POWER AND EVENTUALLY STALLS.  THE CONTACT TOOK THE SCOOTER TO THE DEALER AND WAS INFORMED THAT HIS PARTICULAR MODEL HAD A VAPOR LOCK ISSUE.  IN ADDITION, THE GAS CAP NEEDED TO BE REMOVED AND AIR NEEDED TO BE BLOWN INSIDE.  HE WAS ADVISED TO NEVER FILL THE GAS TANK TO THE TOP.  THE SCOOTER HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED, BUT THE MANUFACTURER IS AWARE OF THE ISSUE.  THE CONTACT BELIEVES THAT THIS IS A MANUFACTURER DEFECT THAT SHOULD BE RECALLED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1,400 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 2,300.     UPDATED 09/16/09 *BF  UPDATED 09/17/09
